verses.kjv: He that dasheth in pieces is come up before thy face: keep the munition, watch the way, make thy loins strong, fortify thy power mightily.
verses.ct: The one who will shatter you has advanced against you. Guard your fortresses, watch the roads, prepare yourself, and gather all your strength.

verses.kjv: For the LORD hath turned away the excellency of Jacob, as the excellency of Israel: for the emptiers have emptied them out, and marred their vine branches.
verses.ct: For the LORD is restoring the honor of Jacob, just like the honor of Israel, even though plunderers have ransacked them and destroyed their vines.

verses.kjv: The shield of his mighty men is made red, the valiant men are in scarlet: the chariots shall be with flaming torches in the day of his preparation, and the fir trees shall be terribly shaken.
verses.ct: The shields of his warriors are dyed red, and his soldiers are dressed in crimson. The metal on the chariots flashes like fire on the day they are assembled, and the cypress spears are brandished fiercely.

verses.kjv: The chariots shall rage in the streets, they shall justle one against another in the broad ways: they shall seem like torches, they shall run like the lightnings.
verses.ct: The chariots race wildly through the streets, rushing back and forth across the open squares. They gleam like torches and dart around like bolts of lightning.

verses.kjv: He shall recount his worthies: they shall stumble in their walk; they shall make haste to the wall thereof, and the defence shall be prepared.
verses.ct: He summons his elite troops, but they stumble as they march. They rush toward the city wall, and the protective shield is set in place.

verses.kjv: The gates of the rivers shall be opened, and the palace shall be dissolved.
verses.ct: The river gates are thrown open, and the palace collapses.

verses.kjv: And Huzzab shall be led away captive, she shall be brought up, and her maids shall lead her as with the voice of doves, tabering upon their breasts.
verses.ct: The decree is issued: the city will be stripped and carried off. Her servant women moan like doves, beating their fists against their chests.

verses.kjv: But Nineveh is of old like a pool of water: yet they shall flee away. Stand, stand, shall they cry; but none shall look back.
verses.ct: Nineveh has been like a pool of water since its earliest days, but now its people are draining away. 'Stop! Stop!' they shout, but no one turns around.

verses.kjv: Take ye the spoil of silver, take the spoil of gold: for there is none end of the store and glory out of all the pleasant furniture.
verses.ct: Plunder the silver! Plunder the gold! There is no end to the treasure — wealth piled up from every kind of precious object.

verses.kjv: She is empty, and void, and waste: and the heart melteth, and the knees smite together, and much pain is in all loins, and the faces of them all gather blackness.
verses.ct: She is stripped bare, gutted, and devastated. Hearts melt, knees buckle, every body trembles with pain, and every face grows pale.

verses.kjv: Where is the dwelling of the lions, and the feedingplace of the young lions, where the lion, even the old lion, walked, and the lion’s whelp, and none made them afraid?
verses.ct: Where now is the lions' den, the place where the young lions fed, where the lion and lioness prowled, and the cubs roamed with nothing to frighten them?

verses.kjv: The lion did tear in pieces enough for his whelps, and strangled for his lionesses, and filled his holes with prey, and his dens with ravin.
verses.ct: The lion tore apart enough prey for his cubs and killed for his lionesses. He filled his caves with victims and his dens with torn flesh.

verses.kjv: Behold, I am against thee, saith the LORD of hosts, and I will burn her chariots in the smoke, and the sword shall devour thy young lions: and I will cut off thy prey from the earth, and the voice of thy messengers shall no more be heard.
verses.ct: "Pay attention — I am against you," declares the LORD of Armies. "I will burn your chariots until they go up in smoke, and the sword will consume your young warriors. I will put an end to your plundering on the earth, and the voices of your envoys will never be heard again."
